description: Rouge-L is Recall-Oriented Understudy for Gisting Evaluation based on Longest Common Subsequence (LCS).Longest common subsequence problem takes into account sentence level structuresimilarity naturally and identifies longest co-occurringin sequence n-grams automatically.

params.name: trans_func
params.description: trans_func transforms the networkoutput to string to calculate.

params.name: vocab
params.description: Vocab for target language.If trans_func is None and RougeL is used as paddle.metric.Metricinstance, default_trans_func will be performed and vocab mustbe provided.

params.name: gamma
params.description: A hyperparameter to decide the weight of recall. Defaults to 1.2.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of paddle.metric.Metric instance. Defaults to rouge-l.
